A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie isn't horrible and it does have its flaws. After you watch this movie\, all the unanswered questions that came from The Force Awakens are insignificant and wonder why they even made its way to TFA in the first place. I think the biggest letdown is that when people see the Star Wars name/brand they have a certain level of expectation or standard. The characters they knew or grew up with have returned and that's what they are looking for. But instead\, they found characters they don't even know anymore...
